title: Turn down absurdly verbose test logging (megabytes)
description:
I wanted to look at a solr test failure to see if i could help fix it. unfortunately, it dumped 26MB of useless logging to the console.

This means i cannot even click on the jenkins console (https://builds.apache.org/job/Lucene-Solr-NightlyTests-4.x/524/consoleText) to look at some stuff about the fail without totally crashing my browser.

This ridiculous amount of verbosity is preventing people from fixing tests, not helping.

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content:
Closing this as resolved now that we have tuned down the logs quite a bit.
Although there may still be a need to move stuff from DEBUG -> TRACE to make debug logs less noisy too...
